alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 8:50PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greeley and Valley Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 849 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Spalding to near North Loup to near Comstock. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Spalding, Greeley, and Ord. Other locations in the path of these storms include Elyria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
